column1: "content": "Opportunities for knowledge-sharing are very valuable in our everyday work lives. Was delighted to share and see how my colleagues across UL Campus use hashtag#Sharepoint to make their work more efficient

"content": "Your title won't be remembered.But how you treat people always will.Positions come and go.Titles change.Companies rise and fall.But your character?That's what people carry with them forever.Here's what truly matters:1/ Respect everyone
column2: regardless of their role‚Ü≥ The janitor deserves the same courtesy as the CEO.2/ Listen more than you speak‚Ü≥ Real leaders hear what others need to say.3/ Give credit where it's due‚Ü≥ Shine the spotlight on your team's wins.4/ Own your mistakes publicly‚Ü≥ Accountability builds trust faster than perfection.5/ Defend your people when they're not around‚Ü≥ Loyalty flows both ways.At the end of your career
column3: nobody will ask:\"What was your job title?\"They'll remember:\"What kind of person were you?\"Your legacy isn't built in boardrooms.It's built in every interaction.Every moment of kindness.Every act of integrity.Treat people well.It's your most powerful leadership tool.‚ôª Repost to inspire a leader in your network.And follow Eric Partaker for more on inclusive leadership.‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äîüì¢ Want to become a world-class CEO?In celebration of the next CEO Accelerator cohort

I wanted to share that I have relocated back to Ireland after 10 great years in Boston working in R&D in academic and biopharmaceutical settings.  I'm currently looking for new opportunities where I can bring my experience to drive the development of new medicines to positively impact patients. My experience spans multiple therapeutic areas including neuroscience
column3: immuno-oncology and most recently infectious diseases.  As a seasoned research leader I can bring many key criteria required for successful delivery of R&D objectives including: ‚úÖ Designing & executing scientific strategies to address knowledge gaps‚úÖ Assessing feasibility of early stage candidates‚úÖ Leading matrix cross-functional teams ‚úÖ Identifying and managing KOL networks ‚úÖAdaptable project management to meet key objectivesAdditionally I am a strong advocate for science literacy and have a proven ability reporting on complex scientific topics for wider audiences. Looking for hybrid or remote opportunities in Ireland
column4: UK or EU.You can help by liking or sharing this post or by tagging anyone in your network who might be interested.  If you know of any opportunity that matches my skills
column5: please send me a message or comment below. hashtag#OpenToWorkThank you!Dara."
